label.span: Shehr: ; Town: ; UC: ; Center ka naam:
Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number

legend.span: Kya aapko khaasi hai?
Are you currently coughing?

label.span: If yes, for how long have you been coughing?

legend.span: Kya aapki khaasi mein balgam ati hai?
Do you currently cough up phlegm or sputum?
Kya aapki khaasi mein khoon ata hai?
Do you currently cough up blood?
Kya aapko seeney mein dard mehsoos hota hai?
Do you currently have chest pain?
Kya aapko bhukar hai?
Do you currently have a fever?
Kya aapko thandey paseeney atey hain?
Do you currently have drenching night sweats (so that you have to change your bedclothes)?
Kya aapka wazan bohut tezi se gir raha hai?
In the past month, have you unexpectedly lost weight?
Kya aapko koi aur alamaat hain?
Do you currently have any other symptoms(s)?
Kya aapne kabhi TB ka ilaaj karwaya hai?
Have you ever taken TB treatment for more than one month?

label.span: Agar haan, tou uska nateja kya tha?
If yes, what was the outcome of your previous TB treatment?

span.span: ilaaj ke liye koi aur jagah ruju kiya

legend.span: Kya aapne HIV ka test pishley 6 mahino mein karwaya hai?
Have you had an HIV test in the past?

label.span: If yes, what is your HIV status?
Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/presumptive_info/province and city= /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/presumptive_info/city_village and town= /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/presumptive_info/town ) or town='na']

input.name: /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/presumptive
input.data-calculate: if( /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/cough ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/chest_pain ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/cough_phlegm ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/fever ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/night_sweats ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/weight_loss ='yes' or /ContactScreeningform_11.01.18/haemoptysis ='yes','yes','no')
